metadata.title: CVE-2019-8380 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Bento4 1.5.1-628. A NULL pointer dereference occurs in AP4_Track::GetSampleIndexForTimeStampMs() located in Core/Ap4Track.cpp. It can triggered by sending a crafted file to the mp4audioclip binary. It allows an attacker to cause a Denial of Service (Segmentation fault) or possibly have unspecified other impact.

notes.note: alexmurray> kodi-inputstream-adaptive contains an embedded copy of bento4

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
